attr.title: Kaiju Big Battel: Fighto Fantasy
attr.desc: Giant monster mayhem! The evil Dr. Cube has used a forbidden weapon to tear apart time and space. It's up to the Kaiju Big Battel Heroes to travel through time and set things right!
attr.inst: Purchase the game from https://super-walrus-games.itch.io/kaiju-big-battel-fighto-fantasy and download the Windows version (Linux should work fine, and probably the Steam versions too). Copy the game file named kaiju.rpg to the port directory. Alternatively, you could play the DEMO version (also on the itch page) -- but using the file named kaijudemo.rpg
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game from [https://super-walrus-games.itch.io/kaiju-big-battel-fighto-fantasy](https://super-walrus-games.itch.io/kaiju-big-battel-fighto-fantasy) and download the Windows version (Linux should work fine, and probably the Steam versions too). Copy the game file named *kaiju.rpg* to the port directory. Alternatively, you could play the DEMO version (also on the itch page) -- but using the file named *kaijudemo.rpg*
